title: Unexpected error when listing GCS directory markers
body:
#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`

N/A

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Getting the following error with `rclond lsd -R` on the GCS bucket with directory markers
```
2023/05/26 22:02:24 ERROR : foo: Entry doesn't belong in directory "foo" (too short) - ignoring
           0 2023-05-26 22:02:24        -1 foo/bar
           0 2023-05-26 22:02:24        -1 foo/baz
2023/05/26 22:02:24 ERROR : httpdocs: Entry doesn't belong in directory "httpdocs" (too short) - ignoring
           0 2023-05-26 22:02:24        -1 httpdocs/admin
           0 2023-05-26 22:02:24        -1 httpdocs/bar
           0 2023-05-26 22:02:24        -1 httpdocs/cache
```

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
$ rclone version
rclone v1.63.0-beta.7054.51a468b2b
- os/version: darwin 13.3.1 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 22.4.0 (arm64)
- os/type: darwin
- os/arch: arm64 (ARMv8 compatible)
- go/version: go1.20.4
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: none
```
#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)
Mac arm64


#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)
Google Cloud Storage

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
rclone lsd gcs://bucket-name/dir_name -R
```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
```
‚ûú  rclone lsd gcs://bucket-name/10000008/dev -R -vv
2023/06/02 14:40:15 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.63.0-beta.7054.51a468b2b" starting with parameters ["rclone" "lsd" "gcs://bucket-name-redacted/10000008/dev" "-R" "-vv"]
2023/06/02 14:40:15 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "gcs://bucket-name-redacted/10000008/dev"
2023/06/02 14:40:15 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/redacted/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2023/06/02 14:40:15 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "gcs://bucket-name-redacted/10000008/dev" to be canonical "gcs:bucket-name-redacted/10000008/dev"
           0 2000-01-01 11:00:00        -1 mule
           0 2000-01-01 11:00:00        -1 mule/blah
           0 2000-01-01 11:00:00        -1 mule/marker
2023/06/02 14:40:16 ERROR : mule/marker: Entry doesn't belong in directory "mule/marker" (too short) - ignoring
2023/06/02 14:40:16 DEBUG : 6 go routines active
```

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
